Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Creates the utility consumer advocate of the Long Island office of the department of public service
Summary: Creates the utility consumer advocate of the Long Island office of the department of public service to advocate and to represent the interests of residential Long Island utility customers.
LawCode: Add ยง3-d, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to creating the utility consumer advocate of the Long Island office of the department of public service
